title: Evil Beneath The Skin
description: Marie Lång disappears without a trace. Two months later, her body is found in a lake. And the killer left a strange token. It soon becomes clear that the case is more complex than originally thought, leading Gävle’s police team to a group of unlikely friends with a dramatic past, a self-made millionaire and his family, a missing woman and old cases with a remarkable resemblance to Marie’s murder.But the attention of Inspector Isa Lindström is not quite on the new case. Still trying to process the impact of the dramatic events on her life, she refuses to accept the official conclusion of the Sandviken case and is determined to bring the real culprits to justice. The arrival of a new superintendent, who seems to have a hidden agenda of his own, further complicates matters.Will they be able to untangle the web of lies and drama and find Marie’s killer?And will Isa finally be able to put the Sandviken case to rest?​​​​​​​Evil Beneath the Skin is the second book in The Find series. If you have not yet read book one, it is recommended that you read this book first. Book two continues the story that began in "The Find".Keywords: mystery, nordic noir, suspense
author: Venezia Miller
